location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 54 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to William Newnham, The Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Acknowledges receipt of letter no. 799 approving representation made by Stannus to the Shaikh of Bahrein [Bahrain] regarding an aggression on a Bahrein boat by an Uttoobee Buglour [‘Utubī baghlah?]. He observes that the aggression was committed on a Mocha boat and the word Bahrein must have been used by mistake.
